author_blurb.en: Translated for SuttaCentral by Bhikkhu Sujato, 2018. Dedicated to the public domain via Creative Commons Zero (CC0). You are encouraged to copy, reproduce, adapt, alter, or otherwise make use of this translation in any way you wish. Attribution is appreciated but not legally required.

segments.en: “For insight into greed, eight things should be developed.

segments.pli: Ajjhattaṃ rūpasaññī bahiddhā rūpāni passati parittāni suvaṇṇadubbaṇṇāni,
segments.en: Perceiving form internally, they see visions externally, limited, both pretty and ugly.
Mastering them, they perceive: ‘I know and see.’

segments.pli: Ajjhattaṃ rūpasaññī bahiddhā rūpāni passati appamāṇāni suvaṇṇadubbaṇṇāni, tāni abhibhuyya ‘jānāmi passāmī’ti evaṃsaññī hoti.
segments.en: Perceiving form internally, they see visions externally, limitless, both pretty and ugly. …

segments.pli: Ajjhattaṃ arūpasaññī bahiddhā rūpāni passati parittāni suvaṇṇadubbaṇṇāni, tāni abhibhuyya ‘jānāmi passāmī’ti evaṃsaññī hoti.
segments.en: Not perceiving form internally, they see visions externally, limited, both pretty and ugly. …

segments.pli: Ajjhattaṃ arūpasaññī bahiddhā rūpāni passati appamāṇāni suvaṇṇadubbaṇṇāni, tāni abhibhuyya ‘jānāmi passāmī’ti evaṃsaññī hoti.
segments.en: Not perceiving form internally, they see visions externally, limitless, both pretty and ugly. …

segments.pli: Ajjhattaṃ arūpasaññī bahiddhā rūpāni passati nīlāni nīlavaṇṇāni nīlanidassanāni nīlanibhāsāni
segments.en: Not perceiving form internally, they see visions externally, blue, with blue color, blue hue, and blue tint. …
Not perceiving form internally, they see visions externally, white, with white color, white hue, and white tint.
Mastering them, they perceive: ‘I know and see.’

segments.pli: rāgassa, bhikkhave, abhiññāya ime aṭṭha dhammā bhāvetabbā”.
segments.en: For insight into greed, these eight things should be developed.”

sections.title: “For insight into greed, eight things should be developed.…
